recipesJson.name: A Custard Recipe
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: A simple vanilla custard with rich egg and butter graham notes layered beneath.

reviews.text: A very good one, tested at day 18. It is a simple custard, very smooth, not too sweet. Very well balanced. Thanks Wayne for sharing.

As you described the first week smelled pretty much like plastic. I didn't try until day 16 and it has become very smooth, thick and is a simple custard. I think ppl can use this one pretty good as a base for their own recipes. Thank you wayne and well done as always!
